sections.name: Hero Section
sections.label: Home
sections.content: **Unleash your wanderlust with our expert holiday planning services.** Whether you're looking for a relaxing getaway or an adventurous escape, Dream Escapades tailors your perfect vacation.

sections.title: About Dream Escapades
sections.subtitle: Who We Are
sections.name: About Section
sections.label: About
sections.content:
### Crafting Unforgettable Journeys  
For over a decade, Dream Escapades has been making travel dreams come true. Our passionate team excels in creating personalized holiday plans backed by years of experience and a love for exploration.

images.name: World Map
images.description: Detailed map of various travel destinations.

sections.title: Our Premier Services
sections.name: Services Section
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Custom Holiday Packages**: Experience travel like never before with plans tailored just for you.  
- **Airport Management & Flight Bookings**: Seamless bookings, efficient airport transfers, and passenger handling.  
- **Local Activity Packages**: Explore local culture, adventures, and attractions with our exclusive packages.
